utterances.transcript: Hi, it's me. I've been trying to reach you all night. I feel awful. Please, Ross, you gotta know there is nothing between me and Mark. This whole break-up thing is just stupid.

I love you.

Okay.

utterances.transcript: Bye.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Chandler and Joey's, Ross has told Chandler and Joey his terrible act.]

utterances.transcript: Oh my God! Oh my God!
Yeah. We figured when we couldn't find you, you'd gone home to make up with Rachel. Which is probably what you shoulda done. Huh?

You think?! God, I, ah, I'm in hell. I mean what, what am I gonna do? Rachel's all like, 'I love you and, and let's work on this.' And all I can think about is, 'What is she gonna do? What is she gonna say?' when I tell her what I did.
Well, before we answer that, I think we should address the more important question. How dumb are you?
What?! Look, we're trying to rebuild a relationship here, right. How am I supposed to do that here, without being totally honest with each other?
Look, Ross look, I'm on board about this totally honesty thing, I am, just not about stuff that's gonna get you in trouble.
He's right. Nobody's gonna benefit, and you're just gonna hurt her.
Yeah, and there won't be a relationship left to rebuild.
Yeah, but don't you think....
All right look, if you absolutely have to tell her, at least wait until the timing's right. And that's what deathbeds are for.
Yeah, okay.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, okay. (he plops down into one of the leather chairs, with the footrest extended.)

utterances.transcript: All right, okay, now, we just have to make sure she doesn't find out some other way. Did you think about the trail?
utterances.transcript_with_note: All right, okay, now, we just have to make sure she doesn't find out some other way. (spins the chair around so that Ross is facing him) Did you think about the trail?

utterances.transcript: What trail?
The trail from the woman you did it with to the woman you hope never finds out who did it! You always have to think about the trail!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (stomps on the footrest which pops Ross up into a sitting position) The trail from the woman you did it with to the woman you hope never finds out who did it! (slapping his hands with each word) You always have to think about the trail!

utterances.transcript: Oh, I-I don't think there's any trail.
Okay, okay-okay, ah, Chloe works with that guy Issac. Issac's sister is Jasmine. And Jasmine works at that message place with Phoebe. And Phoebe's friends with Rachel. And that's the trail, I did it!

plots: Chandler thinks Ross is crazy for cheating on Rachel , whilst Joey urges Ross to find out " the trail " - the list of people between the girl Ross slept with and the girl Ross does n't want to find out what happened .

Ross has to tell Rachel about Jasmine .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: I'm sorry, okay, I'm sorry. I wa-I was disgusted with myself, and this morning I was so, I was so upset and then I got your message and I was so happy, and all I wanted was to get her out of my apartment as fast as possible.
Whoa!! Whoa, whoa, wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave? Oh my God. She was there? She was still there? She was in there, when I was in there?!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Whoa!! Whoa, whoa, wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave? (Ross can't answer that) Oh my God. She was there? She was still there? She was in there, when I was in there?!
(Ross hands Rachel back the newspaper, and she starts beating him with it again.)

utterances.transcript: Listen. Oh hey, hey, the important thing was that she meant, she meant nothing to me!
And yet she was worth jeopardising our relationship!!

utterances.transcript_with_note: (She throws the paper at him, misses and hits Monica's door, they all jump back at the sound.)

utterances.transcript: Look, I didn't think there was a relationship to jeopardise. I thought we were broken up.
We were on a break!
That, for all I knew would, could last forever. That to me is a break-up.
You think you're gonna get out of this on a technicality?
Look, I'm not trying to get out of anything, okay. I thought our relationship was dead!
Well, you sure had a hell of a time at the wake!

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Y'know what, I don't think we should listen to this anymore.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Y'know what, I don't think we should listen to this anymore. (Goes to open the door)

utterances.transcript: What, what are you doing? You can't go out there.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (stopping him) What, what are you doing? You can't go out there.

utterances.transcript: Why not?! I'm hungry.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Why not?! (to Chandler) I'm hungry.

utterances.transcript: Because they'll know we've been listening.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: God! And to have to hear about it from Gunther!!
Come on! Like I wanted him to tell you, I ran all over the place trying to make sure that didn't happen!
Oh, that is so sweet. I think I'm falling in love with you all over again.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Y'know what, I think we can go out there. I mean they have more important things to worry about.
Yeah, we'll be fine.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: Look Rachel, I wanted to tell you, I thought I should, I-I did, and then Chandler and Joey convinced me not to.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Wax the door shut, we're never leaving, ever.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (handing Monica the wax) Wax the door shut, we're never leaving, ever.
[Later, Phoebe is on the phone, they're all still trapped in Monica's bedroom.]

utterances.transcript: Hi, it's Phoebe. Listen someone's gonna have to take my 9:00 with Mr. Rehack, 'cause it's like 9:15 now, and I'm not there.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: Don't you realise none of this would've ever happened if I didn't think at that same moment you weren't having sex with Mark?
All right. Let's say I had slept with Mark. Would you have been able to forgive me?
Yes I would.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (pause) Yes I would.

utterances.transcript: You'd be okay if you knew that Mark had kissed me, and been naked with me, and made love to me?
Yes.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (less sure) Yes.

utterances.transcript: You knew that our hot, sweaty, writhing bodies were....
La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la! Okay, okay, yeah, I would have been devastated but, I would still want to be with you. Because it's, I mean it's you.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (covering his ears and screaming) La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la! Okay, okay, yeah, I would have been devastated but, I would still want to be with you. Because it's, I mean it's you.
[Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Ohhhhh!

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Later, Ross and Rachel are sitting in the kitchen.]

utterances.transcript: What? Come on Rach, tell me what you're thinking?
I'm thinking, I'm gonna order a pizza.
Order a pizza like, 'I forgive you?'

utterances.transcript_with_note: (She turns around and glares at him, he turns away.)
[Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Oh man, pizza? I like pizza. Put olives on the pizza.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh man, pizza? I like pizza. (makes like he is trying to send a telepathic message to Rachel) Put olives on the pizza.

utterances.transcript: We could eat the wax! It's organic.
Oh great, food with hair on it.
No, not the used wax.
Because that would be crazy?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: Hey, can I, can I get in on that? Because I'm kinda hungry myself.
Fine. Hi! Yes, I'd like to order a large pizza.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Fine. (on phone) Hi! Yes, I'd like to order a large pizza.

utterances.transcript: No anchovies.
With ah, extra anchovies.
That's okay, I'll just pick 'em off.
Yeah, and could you please chop some up and just put it right there in the sauce?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to later, they are finishing up the pizza, there's one piece left.]

utterances.transcript: You can have the last piece, if you want.
Well, I should think so. You slept with someone.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Monica's bedroom, they're all eating the wax, Chandler and Phoebe, don't like it. Joey tries some and makes a face like 'Hey, that's not so bad.']

utterances.transcript: They're gonna get through this, aren't they?
Yeah, come on, it's Ross and Rachel, they've got too.
What if they don't?

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Long pause.)

utterances.transcript: You think I need a new walk?
What?
Well y'know, I've been walking the same way since high school. Y'know, y'know how some guys they walk into a room and everybody takes notice. I think I need a 'take notice' walk.
Are you actually saying these words?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Later, in the living room, Rachel is sitting on the couch, Ross is on the chair.]

utterances.transcript: What, now you're not even taking to me? Look Rachel, I-I'm sorry, okay, I'm sorry, I was out of my mind. I thought I'd lost you, I didn't know what to do. Come on! Come on, how insane must I have been to do something like this? Huh? I-I don't cheat right, I, that's not me, I'm not Joey!
utterances.transcript_with_note: What, now you're not even taking to me? (moves over to the coffee table) Look Rachel, I-I'm sorry, okay, I'm sorry, I was out of my mind. I thought I'd lost you, I didn't know what to do. Come on! Come on, how insane must I have been to do something like this? Huh? I-I don't cheat right, I, that's not me, I'm not Joey!
[Cut to Monica's bedroom]

utterances.transcript: Whoa-ho-ho! Yeah, okay.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Whoa-ho-ho! (He looks at Chandler, who gives him a 'come on' look.) Yeah, okay.

utterances.transcript: Hey. It's three in the morning. They don't know that I've come home yet. You notice how neither one of them are wondering where I am.
Yeah, y'know, people can be so self-involved.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room]

utterances.transcript: Y'know what, y'know what, I'm-I'm not the one that wanted that, that break, okay. You're the one that bailed on us. You're the one that, that ran when things got just a little rough!
That's....
That's what?!
That is neither here nor there.

Okay, well here we are. Now we're in a tough spot again, Rach. What do you want to do? How do you want to handle it? Huh? Do you wanna fight for us? Or, do you wanna bail? Look, I, I did a terrible, stupid, stupid thing. Okay? And I'm sorry, I wish I could take it back, but I can't. I just can't see us throwing away something we know is so damn good. Rachel, I love you so much.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay, well here we are. Now we're in a tough spot again, Rach. What do you want to do? How do you want to handle it? Huh? Do you wanna fight for us? Or, do you wanna bail? (sits down next to her) Look, I, (on the verge of tears) I did a terrible, stupid, stupid thing. Okay? And I'm sorry, I wish I could take it back, but I can't. (We see Monica and Phoebe are almost in tears.) I just can't see us throwing away something we know is so damn good. Rachel, I love you so much.
(He kisses her on her shoulder, then her neck, then the side of her face, then just before he kisses her on the lips....)

utterances.transcript: No Ross!! Don't! You can't just kiss me and think you're gonna make it all go away, okay? It doesn't work that way. It doesn't just make it better. Okay?
utterances.transcript_with_note: No Ross!! (stands up and moves away from him) Don't! You can't just kiss me and think you're gonna make it all go away, okay? It doesn't work that way. It doesn't just make it better. Okay?

utterances.transcript: Okay, okay, okay.
I think you should go.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (softly) I think you should go.

utterances.transcript: What?
I really think you need to go now.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (softly) I really think you need to go now.

utterances.transcript: Okay, okay. This morning you said there was nothing so big that we couldn't work past it together...
utterances.transcript_with_note: (moving over to stand in front of her) Okay, okay. This morning you said there was nothing so big that we couldn't work past it together...

utterances.transcript: Yeah, what the hell did I know!

Look, look, there's got to be a way we can work past this. Okay, I can't imagine, I can't imagine my life without you. Without, without these arms, and your face, and this heart. Your good heart Rach, and, and....
utterances.transcript_with_note: Look, look, there's got to be a way we can work past this. Okay, (takes a hold of one of her arms.) I can't imagine, I can't imagine my life without you. (Both of them are starting to cry.) Without, without these arms, and your face, and this heart. Your good heart Rach, (drops to his knees and hugs her around her waist) and, and....

utterances.transcript: No. I can't, you're a totally different person to me now. I used to think of you as somebody that would never, ever hurt me, ever. God, and now I just can't stop picturing with her, I can't, it doesn't matter what you say, or what you do, Ross. It's just changed, everything. Forever.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (crying) No. I can't, you're a totally different person to me now. I used to think of you as somebody that would never, ever hurt me, ever. God, and now I just can't stop picturing with her, I can't, (Ross stands up and backs away) it doesn't matter what you say, or what you do, Ross. It's just changed, everything. Forever.
[We see the rest of them are now crying.]

utterances.transcript: Yeah, but this can't be it, I mean.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (crying) Yeah, but this can't be it, I mean.
(Pause)

utterances.transcript: Then how come it is?

span_qa.question: What does Joey have when he runs in to check on Phoebe and Monica ?
Who is in Monica 's bedroom removing wax strips from their legs ?
When Monica pulled off the wax strip what did she scream ?
Why did Joey and Chandler run into Monica 's room ?
How did Phoebe describe the pain of waxing their legs ?

answers.answer_text: For your information , this happens to be a pain like no man will ever experience .

span_qa.question: What is in Joey 's possession when he goes to check on Phoebe and Monica ?
Who is taking wax strips from their legs in Monica 's bedroom ?
When the wax strips are pulled from Monica what does she yell ?
Why is the reason that Joey and Chandler rush to Monica 's room ?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica's bedroom.]

utterances.transcript: They've been quiet for a long time.
Maybe she killed him?
Let's go.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Living Room, Rachel is sleeping on the couch, Ross is gone, the rest of them can finally emerge from their cell. They all wave good bye, and start to walk quietly out, as Monica goes and puts a blanket on Rachel. Joey starts walking all hunched over and bobbing his shoulders as he goes.]

utterances.transcript: Is that your new walk?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (to Joey) Is that your new walk?

utterances.transcript: No, I really have to pee.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (whispering) No, I really have to pee.

plots: The gang is able to finally leave the bedroom after Ross and Rachel 's big fight , Joey walks funny having to pee .
Meanwhile , much later , the other four are able to get out where they find Rachel still in her clothes and sleeping on the couch and Ross is gone .
Chandler asks Joey if Joey doing a new walk and Joey answers
Phoebe says things have been quiet and then the group find Rachel sleeping on the couch and Ross gone .

span_qa.question: What is Rachel sleeping on ?
Who is gone ?
Why does Joey walk funny ?
How do they walk out of the room ?
What is being slept on by Rachel ?
Who is not present ?
Why is Joey walking funny ?
How is the room walked out of by them ?
